alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morrill County through 500 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, or 29 miles northwest of Oshkosh, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 and Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
